description.title: Monitorscript injection and execution, sending events from input file
description.purpose: Demonstrates starting an Event Correlator, attaching a receiver to the Correlator, injecting a monitorscript application, and sending in a series of input events via event file. Verification of the test is performed by an ordered grep through the Correlator log file for log messages written by the application, and by performing a file comparison with a reference file for the events received and written to file by the attached receiver.
